about_the_game:
Savage Saturday Cinema: Rites of Spring and Madness

Rites and Sacrifices! "There are things which wait out in the darkness of space and in the interstitial corners of time. They await the stars to align and for their followers to call them enter this world, when they'll feast on the flesh and torment of humanity."

This Savage Saturday Cinema is a modern horror adventure, with ties to the Savage Worlds Horror Companion (but with few adjustments you can play it with only the core rulebook). John-Matthew DeFoggi weaves this tale around Igor Stravinsky's ballet The Rite of Spring . An ancient cult is using a special performance of the ballet for their own sinister purposes. Can the investigators of the Twilight Lodge Investigative Agency discover what's happening in time to stop it?

Savage Saturday Cinema adventures are designed to have everything you need for a game session (actually playing it on a Saturday night is optional). Characters are provided, but you can make your own. All you need to bring is some dice, a deck of cards, Savage Worlds, and a sense of adventure!

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:Calum McDermott
